product_name: prAna Raya Swimming Bottoms - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With quick-drying fabric and more coverage than a traditional bikini bottom, the prAna Raya swimming bottoms are comfortable for active beach days or outings on your stand up paddleboard. Polyester and spandex fabric dries quickly and helps protect skin from too much UV light with a UPF rating of 50+; nylon lining increases comfort next to skin. The prAna Raya swimming bottoms offer a next-to-skin fit. Closeout.
short_description: With quick-drying fabric and more coverage than a traditional bikini bottom, the prAna Raya swimming bottoms are comfortable for active beach days or outings on your stand up paddleboard.
